channel.title: Thinking about this setup
channel.description:
Tell me if you guys approve. Please do note this is a custom build. AMD Phenom II X3 720 2.8GHz 3 x 512KB L2 Cache 6MB L3 Cache Socket AM3 95W Triple-Core Black Processor BIOSTAR TA790GX XE AM2+/AM3 AMD 790GX HDMI Micro ATX AMD Motherboard CORSAIR XMS2 4GB (2 x 2GB) 240-Pin DDR2 SDRAM DDR2 800 (PC2 6400) SAMSUNG EcoGreen F2 HD103SI 1TB 5400 RPM 32MB Cache SATA 3.0Gb/s 3.5" Internal Hard Drive NVIDIA GeForce 6800GT overclocked(Just happen to have it). Antec Basiq BP430 430W Continuous Power ATX12V Version 2.2 Active PFC Power Supply Antec Two Hundred Black ATX Mid Tower Computer Case
All this is under $400 USD.

item.title: Thinking about this setup
item.dc:creator: @Tree_Climber Tree_Climber
item.description:
@Tree_Climber wrote:

xEnt:

drop the X3 to X2 and spend a little more on video card, don’t buy that case or PSU, get some cheap case with a PSU that comes with it, spend even more on video card

That case comes with the PSU for $90, you got a better deal?
And I don’t need an amazing graphics card as I don’t play games like Crysis or any of that.
I was just gonna use the 6800GT(It’s over clocked at 256bit.) cause I happen to have one lying around.
I also have a 8800GTX but my dad is gonna put it in his comp.

Read full topic

item.title: Thinking about this setup

item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

get better GFX

get DDR3

get a 7200rpm Hard Drive

Get an ATX motherboard instead of microATX
